Title: The One-Armed Man
Plot: Cooper questions Dr. Jacoby, who suspects Leo Johnson is the killer.  Cooper's supervisior, Gordon Cole, calls in with Albert's report. Josie Packard spies on Ben Horne and Catherine Martell. Hawk tracks down the One Armed Man.   Mrs. Palmer shares her vision of the killer, the same man Cooper saw in his dream (BOB).  Truman and Cooper find the bird who attacked Laura belonged to Leo's friend, Jacques Renault.  Hank Jennings has his parole hearing and makes a threatening phone call to Josie.
GuestStars: Jed Mills, Mary Bond Davis, Mary Chalon, James Graven, Adele Gilbert, Al Strobel, Erika Anderson, David Lynch
